titleStmt.title: A letter from the states of Holland, to the Duke of Savoy: upon his rejecting the advantageous proffers made to him by Pope's nuncio, at Turin, on his masters part; in the behalf of France, to conclude a seperate peace.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Will. Bonny, in Little-Brittain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
